sentences.en: A glutton young, a beggar old.
sentences.cn: 年轻贪食, 老来行乞.

sentences.en: A greedy person , a glutton w ho looks the part , big belly and all.
sentences.cn: 意为“贪吃的人”,挺着大肚子, 一副暴食者的形象.

sentences.en: He is just a glutton. He is addicted to excessive eating.
sentences.cn: 他就是个老饕,贪吃成性.

sentences.en: He was a glutton for hard work.
I can't control my eating. It's hard when people don't understand and call you a glutton.
sentences.cn: 我无法克制自己的食欲，当人们不理解而叫我贪吃鬼的时候心里别提有多难受了。

sentences.en: In the appeasement of the glutton they have to practise much stimulation.
sentences.cn: 因为要满足这个暴食者,她们不得不做许多伪装.

sentences.en: Indeed , this child is a glutton.
Ivy must be a glutton for punishment.
sentences.cn: 艾维一定是个不怕吃苦的家伙。

sentences.en: She kept coming to work even when she was ill: she's a real glutton for punishment.
sentences.cn: 即使病了她仍继续工作,她真是不怕吃苦.

sentences.en: She's a glutton for work . She stays late every evening.
sentences.cn: 她是个工作狂,每天都很晚才下班.

sentences.en: Sometimes he gets hungry and eats like a glutton.
sentences.cn: 当他饿的时候,吃起东西来像个老饕.

sentences.en: You're going to drive all the way to London and back in a day? You're a glutton for punishment, aren't you ?
sentences.cn: 你打算一路开车到伦敦,一天就跑个来回? 你真不怕吃苦, 不是 吗 ?

sentences.en: You've eaten the whole pie, you glutton!
sentences.cn: 你把整块馅饼都给吃了, 你这贪吃鬼!

sentences.en: Your brain a glutton for nourishment.
sentences.cn: 你的头脑对有营养的东西可是贪得无厌的.

words.tran_cn: 暴食，暴饮暴食；贪食，贪吃

phrases.tran_cn: 以做困难（或令人生厌）的工作为乐的人，喜欢自讨苦吃的人

trans.tran_cn: 贪食者，<口>贪图者，酷爱…的人，狼獾
trans.tran_en: If you say that someone is a glutton for something, you mean that they enjoy or need it very much
